widgets.title: Total Builds
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(buildId) as Builds, filter(uniqueCount(buildId), WHERE buildEventType='finalized' and buildResult ='SUCCESS') as 'Passed', filter(uniqueCount(buildId), WHERE buildEventType='finalized' and buildResult != 'SUCCESS')  as 'Failed'  from AppBuildEvent since today

widgets.title: Overall Build Results
widgets.nrql: SELECT filter(uniqueCount(buildId), WHERE buildEventType='finalized' and buildResult ='SUCCESS') as 'Passed', filter(uniqueCount(buildId), WHERE buildEventType='finalized' and buildResult != 'SUCCESS')  as 'Failed' FROM AppBuildEvent TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Builds By Host
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(buildId) as Builds from AppBuildEvent facet jenkinsMasterHost

widgets.title: Builds By Job
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(buildId) as Builds from AppBuildEvent facet jobName

widgets.title: Average Build Duration
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(buildDuration), max(buildDuration), min(buildDuration) from AppBuildEvent  TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Average Build Duration By Job
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(buildDuration) from AppBuildEvent facet jobName TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Build Activity Compared to Yesterday
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(buildId) as Builds from AppBuildEvent since today timeseries compare with 1 day ago

widgets.title: Application Deployments By Revision
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM AppDeploymentEvent FACET revision
